summary: During the hour, a routine fire law drill was conducted at Burt Mills Elementary, a minor traffic obstruction was reported at 1590 Rockville Pike, a light smoke fire incident occurred at 1707 Gullabrook Farm Lane, and an ambulance response was dispatched to an automatic medical alarm at Four Corners Apartments.

highlights.description: Fire department conducted a scheduled fire law drill at Burt Mills Elementary, directing crew to 712 and truck 716 for routine training.
Crew responded to a vehicle obstruction on Rockville Pike where a vehicle was stuck over the wheel, creating a potential traffic hazard; units 701 and Blockhead were dispatched.

Firefighters arrived at 1707 Gullabrook Farm Lane and observed light smoke emerging from the garage of a twoâ€‘story home; they conducted a 360 check, secured occupants, and established a command post.
Ambulance 716 responded to an automatic medical alarm at Four Corners Apartments on University Boulevard West; units 7 alpha 1 were dispatched to provide medical assistance.
